structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXIII. NW 7TH AVENUE CORRIDOR COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AGENCY

text.section: The Board hereby designates Dr. Mae Bryant as Chair and Todd Ruderman as Vice Chair of the Agency.
All future appointments of chairs, vice-chairs and board of commissioners of the Agency shall be made by amendment to this Ordinance.

All prior and current appointments made pursuant to Resolution Nos. R-1370-08, R-86-09, R-164-10 and R-571-11 are ratified and approved by this ordinance, as of the effective date of the appointments provided by these resolutions.
